response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value for us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it would be a perfect fit. We are offering this exceptional piece at a special price tailored to your appreciation and needs. Our initial offer stands at $950,000. We understand that such a transaction is significant, and we are committed to ensuring a smooth process. Please let us know if you require any further information or if you wish to proceed with this exciting offer.", "product_price": 950000}
